artist: Larsen Design Studio Hayman-Chaffey France Voiles S. A. Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Sheer Etching Print of palm trees. Vert Rpt. 38" Black background with white. 40" vert. Rpt. (white on black)
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen%2C Inc.%2C Hayman-Chaffey%2C Larsen Design Studio
text: Larsen designers often applied one design on different ground cloths to achieve quite different effects. Paradisio II and Paradisio I both address opacity and transparency concerns as well as set boundaries—Paradisio I to contain water and Paradisio II to limit light.
title: Paradisio II
